data.comment: The first-half is under way at Deepdale - Preston kick-off to start the match.
The first-half is under way at Deepdale - Preston kick-off to start the match.
An attacking Preston player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Daniel Johnson converts the penalty to give Preston a 1-0 lead.
Paul Gallagher (Preston) gets a yellow card.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
QPR have kicked-off the second half at Deepdale.
Ilias Chair is on a sub for Marc Pugh for QPR.
Luke Amos is replacing Dominic Ball for QPR at Deepdale.
Geoff Cameron is booked for the away team.
Ben Davies (Preston) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! QPR go level at 1-1 through Grant Hall in Preston.
QPR's Geoff Cameron has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
Jayden Stockley is replacing Paul Gallagher for the home team.
Ryan Manning is on target to give QPR a 1-2 advantage.
Preston make their second substitution with Ryan Ledson replacing Josh Harrop.
The home team replace Tom Barkhuizen with Scott Sinclair.
Luke Amos (QPR) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Eberechi Eze extends QPR's lead to 1-3.
It's 1-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
